abstract: A dictionary that contains metadata related to an order.

items.description: The authentication token supplied to your web service.
items.name: authenticationToken

items.description: A unique order identifier scoped to your order type identifier.
items.name: orderIdentifier

items.description: An identifier for the order type associated with the order.
items.name: orderTypeIdentifier

items.description: The URL of your web service.
items.name: webServiceURL

items.description: Optional metadata for an order that the customer placed using this payment method.
items.name: orderDetails

title: ApplePayPaymentOrderDetails
